entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test interceptors in combination with EnC #72345
  • Add an option to scope refactoring/code action only to changed files #72344
  • [Bug]: Code fix `Convert to regular constructor` generates incorrectly for class without body #72340
    Backlog
  • [Bug]: Choosing IntelliSense member for `abstract override` does not generate corresponding code snippet #72338
  • [Bug]: Suggestion `IDE0300` does not appear for arguments in primary constructor's base class constructor #72337
    Backlog
  • IDE0251 (Make member readonly) false positive when GetEnumerator() is not readonly #72335
  • EnC fails when replacing generated regex attribute string #72331
  • Roslyn Crash #72327
  • Publish a source package for the editorconfig parser #72324

Closed

  • CA2000 IDisposable.Dispose does not understand variable aliasing. #72329
  • CA1012 Abstract type should not have public constructors #72330
  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding - "Enable and ignore future errors" does not work #72339
  • [Bug]: `Extract to static readonly field` code fix does not generate required field #72334
  • CallerArgumentExpression does not work with dynamic #72328
  • `SyntaxGenerator`: cannot add an operator member declaration to an interface declaration #67019
    17.10
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34628.19 #72320

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/72220 as it appears to b… #72347
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support parsing for `allows` constraint #72346
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Simplify IStreamingFindUsagesPresenter.StartSearch API #72343
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72342
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Explicitly use dotnet pwsh in scripts #72341
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test whether PublishData.json check works #72336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check PublishData.json #72333
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0028: Added simplifying collection initializer in tuple #72332
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Find usage message severity #72326
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Merge multiple translation actions into a single action #72325
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce signing parallelism to mitigate OOMs in official builds #72322
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix compiler vsix deployment #72321
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Bump patch version for NuGet publish purpose #72348
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include SourceLink file in CoreCompile dependency checks #72109
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Change compiler server timeout #72323
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • More PRs for 17.10P2 snap #72299
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle OperatorDeclaration when adding a member #72276
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix 'convert to file scoped namespace' and interpolated raw strings #72297
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Address some PROTOTYPE comments #72298
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

Updated

  • Incorporate underlying type's hierarchy into overload resolution #72155
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • Reduce allocations in lexer #72243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • GetRelative paths accepts paths shorter than the base directory #72166
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disable CodeQL in unofficial builds #72302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixed List pattern is not correctly formatted in the first arm of a switch expression #72269
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE
  • Fix line endings of semantic snippets #71731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove UsingToolNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies #72304
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Small optimization around ProjectState modification operations #72313
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce byte[] allocations when opening files #72214
